About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself...

BIO

Full stack web developer with a background in finance. As a self starter, I have a passion for learning and creating productive web applications with a friendly user-interface that helps people be more efficient in their daily tasks. With experience in Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, Java, and React, I bring strong skills in organization, problem-solving, and customer service that can be strategically leveraged to generate desired results.
